lead_paragraph: A parcel bomb with a timer exploded early Sunday morning in front of a Florence bookstore run by a neo-fascist group, seriously wounding a policeman trying defuse the device, authorities said.
snippet: A parcel bomb with a timer exploded early Sunday morning in front of a Florence bookstore run by a neo-fascist group, seriously wounding a policeman trying defuse the device, authorities said....

headline.main: Parcel Bomb at Far-Right Bookshop Wounds Italian Policeman
headline.print_headline: Parcel Bomb at Far-Right Bookshop Wounds Italian Policeman
